entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is standing nervously between Ron and Harry, looking from one to the other. She is described as a person who is emotional and reactive.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is opening his mouth uncertainly and is about to apologize. He is described as someone who is uncertain and apologetic.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry knows that Ron was about to apologize and suddenly he doesn't need to hear it. Harry is described as someone who is understanding and empathetic.

relationships.description: Ron is about to apologize to Harry, but Harry tells him to forget it.
Hermione bursts into tears and shouts at Ron, calling them 'stupid'.
Harry tells Ron to forget it and grins back at him, showing understanding.
